feat(auth)!: :sparkles: replace jsonwebtoken with jose

Why:
The jsonwebtoken library has known CVEs and lacks native TypeScript
types. jose is standards-compliant, provides full TS support, and
has zero native dependencies, reducing attack surface and maintenance
burden.

What:
Migrate all token signing from jwt.sign() to jose SignJWT builder
pattern. Token verification now uses jwtVerify() with explicit
algorithm allowlist. Updated auth middleware to handle jose Promise
return values. Dependencies updated in package.json.

BREAKING CHANGE: JWT tokens signed with jsonwebtoken are incompatible
with jose. All active sessions will be invalidated. Users must log in
again after deployment.

Ticket: PROJ-189
Signed-off-by: Alice Developer <alice@example.com>
